page.title: 15Types of Employment
page.content: Of the persons other than full time housewives 88% are full time,12% part time.Men are employed in the Rayleigh area mainly in public service,light industry,managerial,self employed.For women clerical,domestic,shop work.In radius of 10mls men are public service managerial,light industrial,other services eg carpentry.Women are light industrial,teaching,clerical,banking public service.Further than 10mls men are managerial,banking,accountancy, public service,engineering and design. Thoughts for the future-Claire Cray 11 yrs old.I don't think there will be many job opportunities unless you are good with computers.They will be runn- ing things.Computers aren't bad things but they don't do much for employment. I don't think women will have any more equal opportunities in the future than they have now.I'd like to be a dancer.
